jobId.description: The name of the job to flush

calcInterim.description: Calculates interim results for the most recent bucket or all buckets within the latency period

start.description: When used in conjunction with calcInterim, specifies the range of buckets on which to calculate interim results

end.description: When used in conjunction with calcInterim, specifies the range of buckets on which to calculate interim results

advanceTime.description: Setting this tells the Engine API that no data prior to advanceTime is expected
